titlestmt.titleproper: Forage and Grassland Foundation, Inc., Records
Preliminary Guide to the Forage and Grassland Foundation, Inc., Records, 1981-2022, undated 2023ms014

repository.corpname: University of Kentucky Special Collections Research Center

did.unittitle: Forage and Grassland Foundation, Inc., records
did.abstract: The Forage and Grassland Foundation, Inc., Records (dated 1981-2022, undated; 1 cubic foot; 1 record storage carton) includes Board meeting minutes and lists of Board members (1984-2018); financial reports (1984-2016); newsletters and brochures, including from the American Forage and Grassland Council (1984-2010); articles, bylaws, and non-profit documents (1984-2001); background information (1981-2002); and reports on grants and from grantees (1985-2022).

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to researchers by appointment

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection is arranged in the order received.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Forage and Grassland Foundation (FGF) is a non-profit corporation that was formed in 1983 with approximately $100,000 from the XIV International Grasslands Congress organized by the American Forage and Grassland Council, Inc. and the University of Kentucky (UK) and held at UK in Lexington, Kentucky, in June 1981. Gary Lacefield was the first Secretary. The purpose of the Foundation is to strengthen forage livestock systems around the world by providing a perpetual source of funding to support and enhance forage livestock agriculture. The FGF has a priority relationship with the American Forage and Grassland Council, Inc.

Source: 1. Information in collection donor file. 2. Wilkins, Roger, Allen, Vivien G., et al.The History of the International Grassland Congress 1927-2020. Lexington, Kentucky, USA: Forage and Grassland Foundation, 2021. pp. 84-86.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: 2023ms014 : [identification of item], Forage and Grassland Foundation, Inc., Records, 1981-2022, undated, University of Kentucky Libraries Special Collections Research Center.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Forage and Grassland Foundation, Inc., Records (dated 1981-2022, undated; 1 cubic foot; 1 record storage carton) includes Board meeting minutes and lists of Board members (1984-2018); financial reports (1984-2016); newsletters and brochures, including from the American Forage and Grassland Council (1984-2010); articles, bylaws, and non-profit documents (1984-2001); background information (1981-2002); and reports on grants and from grantees (1985-2022).

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The physical rights to the materials in this collection are held by the University of Kentucky Libraries Special Collections Research Center.

did.unittitle: Conference and information brochures (American Forage and Grassland Council newsletter, AFGC leadership and advocacy workshop)
Basic information (new board member orientation handout that includes history, yearly funding, and criteria used in evaluating proposals)
Board members (list of names and contact information)
Brochures (Introducing the Forage and Grassland Foundation and some of the original drafts of the brochure)
Correspondence (Garry Lacefield and John Baylor) (2 folder)
Grants awarded (reports and thank you notes, John Baylor scholarship form) (2 folders)
Grants, reports from recipients of travel grants to XVI Congress, Nice, France
Financial reports (balance sheet and expense statement) (34 folders )
Foundation formation (background information, objectives, and progress report)
Insurance ( Kentucky Insurance Agency and policy change form)
International Grasslands Congress (Proceedings and governing board members) (6 folders)
Internal Revenue Service non-profit status (ruling, tax exemption application, and power of attorney form)
Grassland-related (picture and tribute song to forage leaders)
Letters and outreach to other foundations (Forage 1000 Club information)
